main event: A civilian reported observing an unidentified flying object in Fairplay, Colorado on April 4, 1967.
interesting points: The sighting lasted 1 minute and 30 seconds., The object was described as having an oblong to circular shape, approximately 2-3 inches across., The color of the object was noted as shiny metallic green., The object descended gradually behind a tree line, appearing to land., No sound was associated with the sighting.
